titleStmt.title: A harmonie vpon the the three Euangelists, Matthew, Mark and Luke with the commentarie of M. Iohn Caluine: faithfully translated out of Latine into English, by E.P. Whereunto is also added a commentarie vpon the Euangelist S. Iohn, by the same authour.
Harmonia ex tribus Evangelistis composita
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564. In Evangelium secundum Johannem. aut
Pagit, Eusebius, 1547?-1617.
Fetherston, Christopher.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Printed by Thomas Dawson] impensis Geor. Bishop,

notesStmt.note: Translation of "Harmonia ex tribus Evangelistis composita" and "In Evangelium secundum Johannem".
With the Gospel texts in English.

"The holy Gospel of Iesus Christ, according to Iohn, with the commentary of M. Iohn Caluine, faithfully translated out of Latine into english by Christopher Fetherstone .." has separate divisional title, pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
